text: Hi everyone, I think it is a good suggestion in *section styles* to add an image field in *Background type: Gradient* so we can achieve background-image and CSS3 gradient on the same element. Please see screenshot below. Thank you.

Hi <@UE70ED6JV>, thanks for the suggestion! We actually do have a plan to update section styles to achieve that in the future. We're planning on using a "layers" approach, where you can select a first layer and have that be image, color, gradient, etc, then you can add layers above that of image, background, color.
Here is an idea. Lets add the ability to get the width and height from a featured blog image
